titles.title: Concurring in the judgement of the assessment provided by the United States intelligence community regarding Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election.
Concurring in the judgement of the assessment provided by the United States intelligence community regarding Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Intelligence (Permanent Select).

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: Expresses agreement with the intelligence community's assessment regarding Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election.
